name: Flight
desc: Location and scheduling information for an airplane flight.

items.name: arrivalAirport
items.desc: The airport where the flight ends.

items.name: arrivalGate
items.desc: The airport gate where the flight ends.

items.name: arrivalTerminal
items.desc: The airport terminal where the flight ends.

items.name: arrivalTime
items.desc: The scheduled date and time, in the airport’s local time zone, that the flight ends.

items.name: departureAirport
items.desc: The airport where the flight begins.

items.name: departureGate
items.desc: The airport gate where the flight begins.

items.name: departureTerminal
items.desc: The airport terminal where the flight begins.

items.name: departureTime
items.desc: The scheduled date and time, in the airport’s local time zone, that the flight begins.

items.name: flightNumber
items.desc: The flight number, specific to an airline.
